original_text: I want you to know, brothers, that what has happened to me has really served to advance the gospel,
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 당한 일이 도리어 복음 전파에 진전이 된 줄을 너희가 알기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: I want you to know, brothers,
sentences.korean_translation: 형제들아, 내가 너희에게 알게 하고자 하는 것은

sentences.original_text: that what has happened to me
has really served to advance the gospel,
sentences.korean_translation: 복음을 전파하는 데에 오히려 도움이 되었다는 것입니다.
